scripts.build:app:ui: cd packages/pytheas-ui/ && npm run build && cd - && cp -R ./packages/pytheas-ui/dist ./packages/pytheas-app/dist-ui
scripts.build:app:ui-wc: cd packages/pytheas-ui-wc/ && npm run build && cd - && rm -rf ./packages/pytheas-app/dist-ui && cp -R ./packages/pytheas-ui-wc/dist ./packages/pytheas-app/dist-ui
scripts.package:app:osx: npm run build:app:ui && cd ./packages/pytheas-app/ && npm run package:osx
scripts.package:app:linux: npm run build:app:ui && cd ./packages/pytheas-app/ && npm run package:linux
scripts.package:app:win: npm run build:app:ui && cd ./packages/pytheas-app/ && npm run package:win
